document.full_text: the insurers of michael jackson's ill-fated "this is it" london comeback concerts have asked a judge to nullify a $17.5 million policy taken out by promoters, saying they were never told that the singer was taking powerful drugs.
document.title: michael jackson concert insurers decline to pay out
